"Click the Bilibili app icon to open the application and view the welcome screen with a prompt about the youth mode."
"Click on '我知道了' to dismiss the protective mode notification and return to the main content screen."
"Click the search bar and view the search results and history."
"Click the back arrow icon to return to the main recommendation page."
Type the text "原神" in the search bar to access content related to the game Genshin Impact.
"Type 'doge' in the search bar to initiate a search query."
"Click on the '原神' button under '搜索发现' to open the Genshin Impact page, displaying related videos and content."
"Click on the video titled '《原神》角色逸闻—「元夜灯火」' to open and start playing the selected content."
